full_summary:
================ =
### Contract Notice
#### Notification Title
T8493-230038 S-6063EC-3 BLOWER ASSEMBLY

#### Call Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Contract Number
WS4225132351

#### Duration
**Starting Date:** October 31, 2023
**Ending Date:** March 31, 2024

#### Background
This public contract allows for procurement of the S-6063EC-3 Blower Assembly for the Bell 429 Platform used by Transport Canada's Air Services Directorate.

#### Vendor Eligibility
Applicants must hold a Valid Standing Offer (SO) or Supply Arrangement (SA) under Contract Number T8493-140035 series to Participate in the Tender.

#### Added Details
The call is open only to Selected Preferred Vendors:

| 1.      | Aero Precision Industries LLC
